titleStmt.title: The second part of the reformation of a Catholike deformed by Master W. Perkins
titleStmt.author: Bishop, William, 1554?-1624.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Bishop by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Contains "An ansvvere vnto M. Perkins advertisement." (formerly STC 3093).
Reproductions of originals in the Bodleian Library (reels 1075, 1227, 1706) and Bodleian Library (1683).
